title: Jesus, Straight Outta & Back 2 Heaven!
content:
Christ Jesus is the only man who had no BS with Him.

He came straight outta heaven where there is only grace, truth, love, eternal life.

He is the beginning and the end. The only one straight outta heaven and the first born from the dead back to heaven so that in all things He may have preeminence.


You can straight trust Him! You'd be outta your mind not to.
